mapper.select: select b.id skuId, a.id storeId,a.image storeImage, a.specification storeSpecification,a.spec_argument StoreSpecArgument, b.title skuTitle,b.image skuImage,b.price skuPrice,b.spec_params skuSpecParams, b.status status from tb_store a join tb_sku b on a.id = b.tb_store_id where b.es_version=0 order by b.id asc;
mapper.update: update tb_sku a set a.es_version=#{esVersion} where a.id=#{skuId}
